text_block_list.text:
In the school building at dusk, I found Fuji Kiseki looking out 
the window with a somewhat melancholy look on her face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Fufu, they're adorable when they're working hard.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The field. 
The juniors are doing extra practice.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Every single girl runs through with a glint in their eye. 
Down the final straight, toward their dreams…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Dream "as an Uma Musume"――she said.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I want to run to entertain someone. 
But… I feel as if that's not enough.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: To be the best Entertainer, "Fuji Kiseki."
choice_data_list: Is there anything I can do to help?
Is there anything I can do to help?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Goodness, I just can't help wearing my heart on my sleeve 
around you, can't I. If I may take you up on that offer, I 
actually have a place I'd like to go.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Won't you go on a date with me, Trainer?
I was escorted to our destination by Fuji Kiseki――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Tonight, we invite Trainer to join us here at the Crown Classic 
Hotel.
choice_data_list: That's one of the most exclusive hotels in the country…!
That's one of the most exclusive hotels in the country…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ahahaha, perfect for a date, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
…Joking. 
Actually, this hotel has a theater attached to it!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Today is an important performance. 
My friend――no, my former rival――is playing the lead role for 
the first time.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
We were childhood friends from the children's theatre troupe. 
We were always, always competing for the lead roles.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
When she laughs, the audience laughs. When she cries, the 
audience cries. She possesses such outstanding talent.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: However, those were not her only alarming qualities――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I was terrified. 
She was an extraordinary talent, but she was never satisfied.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I never felt defeated by the desire to entertain someone. 
Still, there was a definite difference between me and her.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'd like to find out what's going to be onstage today.
―and then, the curtain rose.

The leading lady put on a stunning performance. 
Like the brightest star in the night sky, she captivated 
everyone who watched her.

Her gaze and every gesture radiated tremendous passion. 
On stage, she was the most powerful top star.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
――"Eclipse, incomparable goddess, please smile on me. 
Give me the strength to stand once again, my dreams broken."

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
"If I can win this war, I will give my soul. Above my head, now, 
is my crown!"

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ――That was, a wonderful show.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Each and every word she spun made my body hot with passion. 
Sometimes they were in a whisper, sometimes it felt as if they 
would burst forth, others were so compelling.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I wondered, what on earth was making me shake so much.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that's it――passion. 
It was the passion for the play, for pursuing the version of 
myself that I want to fulfill.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
And, a passion to be the best. 
A strong, strong feeling, almost like an obsession, to pursue 
one's dreams.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I was fascinated by that sort of thing; being a top star.
choice_data_list: Have you found the answer to your dream?
Have you found the answer to your dream?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: "Entertain everyone"――

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Somehow or other, I could see what lies ahead.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
It was a great performance; one to remember. 
Congratulations on your first starring role.

text_block_list.name: Fuji's Childhood Friend
text_block_list.text:
…Fuji-chan! I'm so glad you came to see it! 
Oh, I wanted you to see it more than anyone else.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I was mesmerized to the point of being dizzy. 
It pains me to say, but you are the best Entertainer I've seen 
tonight.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But, I don't intend to lose, either. 
Someday, I will entertain everyone enough to surpass you!

text_block_list.name: Fuji's Childhood Friend
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to be the best in the world of acting. 
Even though we're on different stages, you and I are eternal 
rivals.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I am honored. I shall follow my dreams with you.

Upon hearing Fuji Kiseki's words, the girl happily shook hands 
with her and left, waving over her shoulder.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
It's strange, my very core is fired up. 
I just want to start running, right now.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Hey, Trainer. 
I'm glad I got to see the show with you.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The truth is, I was afraid. 
I had to face what I lacked.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
But, with you by my side, Trainer, I was able to find what I 
wanted to be and beyond.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to you, my doubts are gone. 
I will never forget what you did today.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: …What's the matter? You're all quiet.
choice_data_list: No, I just thought you were more handsome than ever…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
What's this? Did I manage to make you fall in love with me? 
If I did, I'd have completed my goal!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Joo～king! 
I'd better get home, or I'll be breaking curfew!
She looked down at her watch, and rushed off to the station.
